biotools.summary: MIOM (Mixed Integer Optimization for Metabolism) is a python library for creating and solving complex optimization problems using genome-scale metabolic networks, in just a few lines. It offers a high-level API that leverages the power of modern Mixed Integer Optimization (MIO) solvers to easily define steady-state metabolic optimization problems, from simple Flux Balance Analysis (FBA) simulations, to more complex problems, such as sparse FBA or context-specific reconstruction algorithms, and solve them the required level of optimality.

bioschemas.name: MIOM
bioschemas.summary: MIOM (Mixed Integer Optimization for Metabolism) is a python library for creating and solving complex optimization problems using genome-scale metabolic networks, in just a few lines. It offers a high-level API that leverages the power of modern Mixed Integer Optimization (MIO) solvers to easily define steady-state metabolic optimization problems, from simple Flux Balance Analysis (FBA) simulations, to more complex problems, such as sparse FBA or context-specific reconstruction algorithms, and solve them the required level of optimality.
